title: css
content: <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css"><style>div {    border: 1px solid black;    margin-top: 100px;    margin-bottom: 100px;    margin-right: 150px;    margin-left: 80px;    background-color: lightblue;}p {    text-align: center;    color: red;} body {    background-color: lightblue;    }</style>
